question: Where can I find my access code?
answer:
The access code is an alphanumeric code of 12-20 characters (e.g., RP4E5F678923). You can find it:
• Inside cover of your Richmond book
• Card included with the book
• CD-ROM or email if digital product

If you can't find it, ask your teacher.

question: How do I register on the platform?
answer:
To register:
1. Go to www.richmondlp.com/register
2. Enter your Access Code
3. Fill in your personal details
4. Enter Class Code (optional)
5. Confirm your email

If you don't receive the email, check spam or use 'Resend confirmation email'.

question: How do I log in?
answer:
Log in at www.richmondlp.com with your email and password.

If you forgot your password, use the 'Forgotten password' option at login.

question: My code says it's already been used
answer:
The Access Code can only be used ONCE to create an account.

If you see this error:
• Someone already used that code
• Verify it's your correct code
• Contact your teacher for a new code

question: It says my email already exists
answer:
An account with that email already exists.

Solutions:
• Use 'Forgotten password' to recover your password
• Use a different email to register
• Contact support if you think it's an error

question: Where can I see my assignments?
answer:
Your assignments appear in:
• 'My Assignments' or
• 'My tasks'

If they don't appear, verify the product is activated in 'My Products'.

question: Where are my materials?
answer:
Materials are found in:
• 'Class Materials' or
• 'My study materials'

If they don't appear, verify the product is activated in 'My Products'.

question: Is there a mobile app?
answer:
Yes, the RLP+ app is available for iOS and Android.

• Download from App Store or Google Play
• Use the same username/password as the web
• Allows downloading content for offline use

question: How do I contact support?
answer:
You can get help at:
• Help center: rlp-ug.knowledgeowl.com/help
• Contact: through richmond.com.mx
• Your teacher or institution administrator

question: I can't click Submit
answer:
If the Submit button doesn't work:
• Check your internet connection
• Update your browser
• Clear cache and cookies
• Try another browser
• Contact support if it persists
